pull.title: BIP340 updates: even R, new tags, small fixups, clarifications
pull.body:
Two semantics changes:
* Change the R point to be implicitly even (rather than implicitly square; see https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2020-August/018081.html for discussion)
* Change the tags for hashing from "BIP340/" to "BIP0340/", to guarantee no collisions with the previous draft.

There are also a number of changes to the document that do not change semantics, but just improve clarity, or fix typos.

events.message:
BIP-0340: small fixups

- key prefixing means prefixing the message
- array indexing starts with 0
- 'Gennaro' is spelled with two n's
- has_even_y definition takes P as argument

Thanks to Alan Szepieniec for pointing out these issues.

BIP-0340: Remove last remaining mention of Jacobi symbol

Jacobi symbol can be confusing because it may suggest that the modulus is
composite.

Thanks to Alan Szepieniec for pointing out this issue.
Clarify security argument of x-only pubkeys better
BIP-0340: note that adapting the spec to other curves is insecure
